rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: Used for a single narrative summary of research, typically covering a wide range of activities and time periods; use Researcher Role for information on individual activities
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: research overview
University
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: An institution of higher education and research, which grants academic degrees in a variety of subjects, and provides both undergraduate education and postgraduate education.
rdf:Description.vitro:exampleAnnot: University of Florida; Washington University in St. Louis

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: position in organization
rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: This relates a person's position to the organization that has that position.
This relates a person's position information to the person themselves.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: position for person

rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: An academic administrative position (associate dean, etc.) as distinct from a professional administrative position (non-academic)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Faculty Administrative Position
rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: That is a position held by an academic faculty member who works for administration.

rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: The middle name or initial with which you normally identify yourself. Only one may be entered.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: middle name or initial
URLLink
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: Uniform Resource Locator (URL) specifies where an identified resource is available and the mechanism for retrieving it.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organization within
rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: Relates an sub-organization to the organization that contains it.

rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: A course as taught in one time period (such as a semester; although note that a course could consist of only one meeting (teaching session)) by one or more instructors, normally but not always for credit. Does not represent either each meeting of the course or the course offering such as Biology 101 taught every semester from 1980 to 2010
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Course
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: A course as taught in one time period by one or more instructors, normally but not always for credit. Does not represent either each meeting of the course or the course offering such as Biology 101 taught every semester from 1980 to 2010

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: start
rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: the start of a time interval.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Academic Term
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: An explicit individual academic term, quarter, or semester rather than the generic fall, spring or summer semester.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Division
rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: Definition modified from http://www.thefreedictionary.com/division. It is difficult to tell the difference between a division and a department.
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: An area of corporate activity organized as an administrative or functional unit.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sub-organization
rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: Relates an organization to the sub-organization that it contains.
Used to provide a visible, clickable text to a hyperlink in VIVO.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: link anchor text

rdf:Description.vitro:exampleAnnot: Currently any abstract name is given to individuals of this class. This could change in the future.
rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: This connects person to their academic degree through this educational training, but can also be used when the training does not result in a degree.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Educational Training
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: Represents educational training that has been received.

rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: Please enter a single narrative summary description of your teaching activities, goals, and/or experience
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: teaching overview
rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: Used for a single narrative summary of teaching, typically covering a wide range of courses including for credit and non-credit teaching over multiple semesters; the "teaches" property links a person directly with an instance of a Semester Class, typically from an institutional database of record; then use Teacher Role for information about a person's role in non-credit teaching or their specific contribution to individual courses

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: educational organization
rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: This relates an instance of Educational Training to the Organization that provided the training.
A short narrative summary to be used as a single descriptive overview statement.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: overview

rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: Academic position in a university or institution
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Faculty Position
rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: Professor, associate professor and assistant professor are common positions for academic faculty.

rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: This relates a person to their position information.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: positions
webpageOf
rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: The core:webpage relates to an intermediate node (of type core:URLLink) that allows specifying the homepage URL as a literal, as well as a human-readable label ("anchor text") for the link.
This relates an organization to the person's position(s) within that organization.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: people
Faculty Member
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: A person with at least one academic appointment to a specific faculty of a university or institution of higher learning.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: collaborator
rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: Use for a simple assertion that a person or organization is your collaborator; to describe the relationship in more detail enter a role for each collaborator in some common endeavor.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Date/Time Interval
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: a specific period or duration, defined by (optional) start and end date/times.

rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: The core:webpage relates to an intermediate node (of type core:URLLink) that allows specifying the homepage URL as a literal, as well as a human-readable label ("anchor text") for the link.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: webpage

rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: enter the position in the list that you would like this item displayed
rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: this number indicates a position in a list
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rank

rdf:Description.vitro:exampleAnnot: Endodontics (department within a College of Dentistry); English (department within a College of Liberal Arts)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Academic Department
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: A distinct, usually specialized educational unit within an educational organization.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: preferred title
rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: Enter the title you would prefer to use. This would be different from, and in addition to, your HR job title.
rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: For example an HR job title for a person might be - Assistant University Librarian, and the preferred job title for that same person could be - Physical Sciences Librarian.

rdf:Description.vitro:exampleAnnot: Legal (department within a company); Use for any non-academic department
rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: Definition modified from the definition here: http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/department. It is difficult to tell the difference between and department and a division.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Department
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: A distinct, usually ongoing and specialized unit within a large organization.

rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: Provides the URL for a hyperlink in VIVO.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: link URI

rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: Use when a single date and time is appropriate versus a start date and time and end date and time, or when multiple dates and times are relevant.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: date/time

rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: This relates a person's educational training to the person.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: education or training of
education and training
rdf:Description.vitro:publicDescriptionAnnot: This relates a person to the description of their educational training.

rdf:Description.vitro:descriptionAnnot: An employment activity, whether compensated or not. Short definition comes from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Position, and has been modified.
rdf:Description.vitro:shortDef: Particular position in an organization, commonly identified by job title, and normally associated with a job description that details the tasks and responsibilities that go with the position.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Position
rdf:Description.vitro:exampleAnnot: Director of Admissions and Placement; Associate University Librarian
